ygData.subject: A tear of joy and satisfaction.
ygData.msgSnippet: Please bear with me fellow historians of Norrath but I must say a few things. Our board has over 100 members in the first weekend and as the witness to all
ygData.messageBody:
Please bear with me fellow historians of Norrath but I must say a few things.
Our board has over 100 members in the first weekend and as the witness to all posts and messages I must say that there have been some good questions. Some better answers, and some great ideas.
I must thank everone who has contributed so far, but i must ask another favor.
We have over 100 voices now and as the legendmakers of our world I want your stories for a newsletter. I figure if we get 2 or 3 stories a week i will compile them and send them out to our fellows. If there is anyone who has a web page or link that involves EQ or Bards please send that to me as well I will include all links on the final page of the newsletter as well as the eqbards bookmark section of the list.

Please send me your stories straight to legendsoflore@...
